review_title: Enjoyable and very easy to work with
pros: Good pay and very nice people to work with. It was a steady job. Great location too.
cons: The drive can be tough, especially during the winter time when the roads are wet or there is snow. Careful of the hill.

review_title: Good school, still learning how to grow
pros: Great people and community in a pleasant small town
cons: Management is in flux. The college is currently undergoing changes. President just got fired. The pay does not allow employees to buy a home in the area.

review_title: Not a bad place to work, but the cons far outweigh the pros.
pros: Small and friendly work environment. Relaxed atmosphere.
cons: Budget problems make employment tenuous for everyone there. Terrible pay compared to other community colleges in Oregon.
